# VEHICLE::ALLOW_AMBIENT_VEHICLES_TO_AVOID_ADVERSE_CONDITIONS

## Summary
Allow/disable ambient vehicles pathing around adverse conditions

## Parameters
* **BOOL** allow: Whether to enable it or not (default is TRUE / enabled)
